[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_text_color=”#666666″ text_font_size=”20″ header_text_color=”#666666″ header_font_size=”20px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”17″ text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”17px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Or visit our clinic at Gold Coast Private Hospital, Suite 8, Ground Floor, 14 Hill Street, Southport QLD 4215

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Section” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_image=”https://coastgastroenterology.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/about-parallex.jpg” parallax=”on” custom_padding=”100px||100px|” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row admin_label=”Row” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” global_colors_info=”{}” column_structure=”1_2,1_2″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Dr Walker’s areas of special interest include:” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font_size=”16″ header_text_color=”#00a79d” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin=”|||20px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Dr Walker’s areas of special interest include:

  • General Gastroenterology
  • Pancreatic and Biliary Disease
  • Inflammatory Bowel Disease
  • Open Access Gastroscopy and Colonoscopy
  • Bowel Cancer Screening
  • Therapeutic Endoscopy
  • Endoscopic Mucosal Resection
  • ERCP – Endoscopic Retrograde CholangioPancreatography
  • Endoscopic Ultrasound
  • Radiofrequency Ablation (HALO)

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Section” _builder_version=”3.22″ background_color=”#31314e” transparent_background=”off” make_fullwidth=”off” use_custom_width=”off” width_unit=”on” global_module=”258″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row admin_label=”Row” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” global_colors_info=”{}” column_structure=”1_2,1_4,1_4″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_code admin_label=”Code” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Address” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”Open Sans||||” text_text_color=”#16a39e” text_font_size=”25″ header_font=”Open Sans||||” header_text_color=”#16a39e” header_font_size=”25px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” global_colors_info=”{}”]

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_code admin_label=”Code” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_code][et_pb_text admin_label=”Parking stations are accessed from…” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”Raleway||||” header_font=”Raleway||||” header_font_size=”16px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” background_layout=”dark” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Parking stations are accessed from Innovation Drive (off Parklands Drive). There are additionally 20 minute drop-off zones for your convenience. For more information on parking and transport options, please
click here.
